experience: You and Darren both know Mark Vange, Jerrod Bailey, and 6 others

In today’s “digital everything” world, all companies have an acute need to modernize their operations and offerings through technology platforms and are forced to become an information technology company. Often this realization leads to distraction, cost and ambiguous strategies on how to deliver their core value to their customers leading to less profit. Architecting and selecting technology is also difficult. Traditional platforms, those that exist in the market today, are by and large bound the the “domain” for which they were constructed to serve. These domains include: Realtime (Information), Knowledge (“Big Data & Analytics) or Wisdom (Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, etc). The architectures for these various domains drastically differ and have significant impact on customer experience and the business's capability to deliver the required product or service to their end-user in a time/cost efficient manner.The SolidIntelligence platform collapses the three “domain bound” unique architectures into one agile platform and was designed for agile extension and scale regardless of the specific market or vertical our customers act in. Leveraging unique “TimeWarp(™)  Technology”, Solid Intelligence delivers a rich ’digital insight’ capability to ultimately connect people to the services they need by converging mobile connectivity,  big-data & analytic backend, and machine learning into one cost-effective, cloud based platform. By gaining access to our platform and the engineering services we provide, our customers are able to realize operational efficiencies in their ITOPS and accelerate their time to market with new product & services offerings leading to a bottom line impact. SolidIntelligence represents the newest and most modern way to approach the market need of gaining access to a robust platform to connect their products and services to their consumers and customers.

Recruited by Private Equity Firm and installed as President. Developed key domestic and international customers and product line. Company acquired by SAIFE in 2017.GreenZone Systems, Inc. a trusted leader in providing secure mobile communications solutions for the government and private sector, specializing in enabling military-grade secure communications and information sharing on commercial, off-the-shelf (COTS) smart devices over public and untrusted networks. GreenZone delivers communication capabilities and solutions for clients who require the most secure and reliable communications available to deploy in the most dangerous and extreme environments around the world.

SAIFE is re-inventing security for today’s agile perimeter. We’ve extended the concept of a Software Defined Perimeter to create the first solution that enables dynamic, agile, network overlay perimeters that are device, user, and application-centric, and which can span on premise, cloud, mobile devices, and applications. SAIFE protects customers by substantially lowering their attack surface and enables information sharing across untrusted networks to reduce 3rd party risk. With cloud computing, mobile devices, collaborative networks, and the IoT creating a smarter world that is more aware, more productive – and more vulnerable, our job is keeping it SAIFE.
Cummings Engineering - A Division of SAIFE, INC.

Founder of consulting/contracting company specializing in government and military software communications. Vision, leadership, and innovation towards bringing transformative technology to produce secure mobility into the government and other data-sensitive markets.Cummings Engineering is the founder of the SAIFE Secure Mobility Suite and is the integration & services arm of SAIFE, Inc.
Provided systems engineering leadership and exertise on a Joint Tactical Radio Wideband Network Manager system. Areas of focus included SNMP and crypto modules.

summary: Engineer, innovator and leader with more than 20 years in developing leading-edge communications technologies for the government and commercial markets. Expert in secure mobile communications capabilities with multiple patents in advanced telecommunications technologies and cryptographic applications, publications, speaking engagements and thought leadership in the industry. Subject Matter Expert (SME) with specialty in designing secure mobile communications solutions for commercial, off-the-shelf devices deployed in both military and commercial enterprise environments. Experienced  entrepreneur, founder and revenue driver with large company and lean-startup background.
